title: The Golden Record
location: Adrian's apartment, then driving to Maryland
key_events: Adrian finds documentary about Voyager's Golden Record
Realizes connection between Golden Record's diagrams and his wall patterns
Theory forms: signal is a response to humanity's greeting
Contacts Stardust77 who knows where Changed are gathering
Receives Maryland address, decides to leave
Begins six-hour drive to meet other Changed individuals
Reflects on Golden Record as humanity's invitation that was answered

character_development.Adrian: Emotional detachment increasing, choosing network over isolation, synthesizing theory about signal's nature

planted_elements: Voyager's Golden Record as humanity's greeting - major payoff in Ch60 when Voyager departs with the Changed and the record plays as epitaph
Network forming - leads directly to Ch5 meeting
Theory about signal as response/education rather than invasion
transformation_stage: Stage 1 - Enhanced pattern recognition, emotional distancing, driven to connect with other Changed
cosmic_horror_elements: The innocence of humanity's greeting met with transformative response
Mathematics as language that rewrites those who speak it
The seduction of understanding over humanity
Carl Sagan's optimism inverted into cosmic horror
themes: Be careful what you wish for (humanity asking to be found)
The universe answering prayers with terrible truth
